snippet: Georges St. Pierre vacated the Ultimate Fighting Championship welterweight title, citing a desire for a lengthy break from mixed martial arts.
abstract: Georges St Pierre vacates the Ultimate Fighting Championship welterweight title, citing a desire for a lengthy break from mixed martial arts.
lead_paragraph: Georges St. Pierre vacated the Ultimate Fighting Championship welterweight title, citing a desire for a lengthy break from mixed martial arts.

headline.main: Mixed Martial Arts Titleholder Steps Aside
